content: {"name": "Bergen County Division of Senior Services / Bergenfield Senior Activity Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Suggested Lunch Donation: $1.25 Per Meal   Please reserve lunch by 11:30 AM the day before ", "email": "", "url": "https://www.co.bergen.nj.us/division-of-senior-services/senior-activity-centers", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "293 Murray Hill Terrace", "address_2": null, "city": "Bergenfield", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07621", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.9142227, "longitude": -73.9932413}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 387-7212", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must call during this time to register and book an appointment"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Lunch"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A donation of $1.25 is accepted for each meal"}]}
